name: Windup
author: Logos

sections.description:
Cut your posts automaticaly after x number of words, or letters. U can stil use tag
and manual excerpt. If non of them are used, plugin will automaticaly cut post at site other that single post site. Make sure taht in your main loop post are displayed by the_content, there is no need to check is_home, puligin do it by itself.

Arbitrary section

A brief Markdown Example

Visit Me at Http://log-this.com
sections.installation:
1. Instal by upload .zip file
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress
  3. Set the initial values in plugin settings, and save them.
sections.changelog:
1.0

  • Minor fixes
  • Off for global test.

0.3.0

  • Fixed conflict with syntaxhighlighter.

0.2.0

  • Fixed pages, categories bug.
  • Improved speed

0.1.0

  • Added support of tag.
  • Added support of maunal Excerpt;
  • Fixed bug of display to many words.
